---
title: "Precipitation 2010-2019"
format: html
editor: visual
---

**Source**: [Historical monthly weather data --- WorldClim 1 documentation](https://www.worldclim.org/data/monthlywth.html)
**Spatial Reference:** GCS_WGS_1984

```{r}
load(here('data', 'grappe_gps.RData')) # elevation var

total_precipitation <- terra::rast(here('data_raw', 'leon_data', 'rasters', 'Total_precipitation.tif'))




# terra::crs(total_precipitation)

total_precipitation_by_grappe <- total_precipitation %>% 
  exactextractr::exact_extract(grappe_buffer) %>% 
  rbindlist(idcol = "id") %>% 
  group_by(id) %>% 
    summarize(water_depletion = sum(value * coverage_fraction) / sum(coverage_fraction))

save(, file = here('data', ''))
  
```
